articles.title: Poco M4 Pro 5G India Launch Today: How to Watch Livestream, Expected Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Poco M4 Pro 5G India launch is taking place today (Tuesday, February 15) through a livestream. The Poco phone debuted in Europe last year, with features including a 90Hz display and a MediaTek Dimensity 810 SoC.
